title: Pie Maker Lemon Meringue Pies
directions: In a medium saucepan whisk together 1 1/4 cups of sugar and cornstarch.
Whisk in egg yolks and lemon juice over medium heat.
Stir in water, continue stirring until mixture comes to the boil.
Boil for approx for 1 minute, stirring constantly until filling is translucent and thick.
Remove from heat. Add butter and lemon zest. Stir till butter has melted.
Beat egg whites and cream of tartar in a bowl until soft peaks form.
Gradually beat in 1/2 cup of sugar until completely dissolved.
Beat until stiff peaks have formed.
Add lemon curd filling and close lid.
Cook until pastry is cooked (approx 5-6 mins).
Spoon meringue onto filling, making sure to spread to edge of crust to seal.
Place on wire rack to cool, then refrigerate.
